law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Breeder" means a person who breeds or raises dogs to sell, exchange, or otherwise transfer to the public.
"Clinically ill" means an illness that is apparent to a licensed veterinarian based on observation, examination, or testing of the dog.

section.section:
"Dealer" means a person who, for compensation:
buys, sells, or negotiates the purchase of a dog; or
delivers for transport or transports a dog.
"Dealer" does not include a person who transports a dog as a carrier only.

text.section:
"Nonelective surgical procedure" means a surgical procedure that is necessary to preserve or restore the health of an animal or to correct a condition that would:
interfere with the animal's ability to walk, run, jump, or otherwise function in a normal manner; or
cause pain and suffering to the animal.
"Purchaser" means any person who purchases a dog from a retail pet store.
"Retail pet store" means a for-profit establishment open to the public that sells or offers for sale domestic animals to be kept as household pets.
